name: ai-content-writer
description: Intelligent Content Creation Platform with 4-Step Wizard - A comprehensive React-based application that leverages AI to create SEO-optimized content through an intuitive wizard process.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:python"

author: Anas Nasim
